Text: Fake - This is red ice radio, not fringe
Lol, what the.... It is not fake!

This is not a fake! I had to register to protest this false accusation. Thank you, teslaman! You're a lifesaver for Fringe addicts who don't have Fox nor Hulu in our part of the world. I only download Fringe from you and no one else!

Perfect scores for both audio and video quality!

Thanks pzyche, much appreciated. :) Sometimes people ask me why I bother....simple, The people out there like you, who wouldn't see it otherwise, or who just want a better avi, is exactly why I upload them. :) Cheers!
